Name: Health Potion
Content: USE: Restore +2 HP {HP}

Name: Speed Potion
Content: USE: Gain +2 Actions this turn. (Can only use one of these per turn.)

Name: Strength Potion
Content: USE: Gain +2 ATK this turn.

Name: Insight Potion
Content: USE: Look at the top 3 cards of the loot deck. Put one on top and the rest on the bottom.

Name: Spiral Crystal
Content: USE: Rotate your current room or an adjacent room by one turn. (60Â°)

Name: Phase Crystal
Content: USE: Move immediately into an adjacent room, ignoring walls.

Name: Labyrinth Crystal
Content: USE: Replace an unoccupied adjacent room with another one from the deck, with the entrance facing you.This counts as you opening the new room. Shuffle the old room back into the deck.

Name: Shift Crystal
Content: USE: Choose a room with only one connected doorway. Move it and attach the entrance to a closed door in the same room as you.

Name: Warp Crystal
Content: USE: Teleport to a room that's exactly 2 spaces away, in a straight line.

Name: Key Fragment
Content: Combine 2 Key Fragments: Get a key. {key}

Name: Thief's Amulet
Content: USE: Steal a random card from another player's hand. (Can only use one of these per turn.)

Name: Magic Top
Content: USE: Swap positions with another player.

Name: Monster Mover
Content: USE: Choose any monster on the board. Move them to another room.

Name: Ornate Coffer
Content: USE: Draw until you have 6 cards in your hand.

Name: Flask Coffer
Content: USE: Draw until you have 4 cards in your hand.

Name: Crystal Coffer
Content: USE: Draw until you have 4 cards in your hand.

Name: Sword
Content: +1 ATK

Name: Berserker's Axe
Content: You gain +1 ATK for each time you attacked this turn. (First attack is +1, second is +2, and so on.)

Name: Calvary Lance
Content:
Gain +1 ATK for each room time you've moved between rooms this turn.
Whenever you slay a monster, you may move once for free.

Name: Archmage's Staff
Content: Using Extra Effort adds +2 damage to your roll, instead of +1.

Name: Sack Flail
Content: You have +1 ATK for every 3 items in your hand.

Name: Demon Slayer's Bow
Content:
1 ATK
+1 ATK against monsters level 3 and higher.
+1 ATK against "Boss" monsters.

Name: Chainmail
Content: +1 DEF

Name: Swift Boots
Content:
You gain +1 action at the start of your turn.
-1 DEF

Name: Lucky Cloak
Content: Whenever you use a Pick-Up action, roll a d4. On a 3 or 4, draw an extra loot card.

Name: Brutal Gauntlets
Content: Whenever you slay a monster, gain +1 loot as a reward.

Name: Architect's Belt
Content: Whenever you open a door, look at the top 2 rooms of the room deck. Choose one, and put the other on the bottom of the deck.

Name: Coward's Trousers
Content:
While equipped, you may choose to ignore an encounter card that you trigger.
If you do, discard this.
